a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prices of key materials for the energy transition, 1900 to 2022
Prices are measured in 1998 dollars per tonne, which adjusts for inflation, using the Consumer Price Index.
Data source: USGS - Historical Statistics for Mineral and Material Commodities (2023)
